sentences.en: Acidification of the duodenum and the presence of bile in the duodenum promote secretin release.
sentences.cn: 十二指肠酸化和十二指肠内胆汁有存在促进分泌素释放。

sentences.en: Gastrin and cholecystokinin and secretin act on the same target organs.
sentences.cn: 促胃液素、缩胆囊素和分泌素作用于相同的靶器官.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, several controlled trials subsequently reported a lack of secretin's effectiveness despite initial enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，尽管最初受到狂热追捧，随后的若干对照试验却报道说分泌素没有效果。

words.tran_cn: 秘密的；偷偷摸摸的；促进分泌的
